Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Westgate Las Vegas Resort & Casino in Las Vegas (East of The Strip), you'll be minutes from Las Vegas Convention Center and close to University of Nevada-Las Vegas. This casino hotel is within close proximity of Las Vegas Country Club and Fashion Show Mall.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 2956 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and LED televisions. Pay movies provides entertainment, and wired and wireless Internet access is available for a surcharge. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Head straight for the casino, or wait for that lucky feeling while you enjoy one of the other recreational opportunities, such as outdoor tennis courts and a 24-hour health club. This hotel also features wireless Internet access (surcharge), concierge services, and gift shops/newsstands.

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at one of the hotel's 8 restaurants and 2 coffee shops/cafés, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Relax with a refreshing drink from a poolside bar or one of the 5 bars/lounges.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include high-speed (wired) Internet access (surcharge), a business center, and limo/town car service. Planning an event in Las Vegas? This hotel has 225,000 square feet (21 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and meeting rooms. Free valet parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Grab a bite to eat at one of the hotel's 8 restaurants and 2 coffee shops/cafés, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Relax with a refreshing drink from a poolside bar or one of the 5 bars/lounges.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Las Vegas Convention Center - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Las Vegas Country Club - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Fashion Show Mall - 1.5 km / 0.9 mi
Sands Expo Convention Center - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Boulevard Mall - 2 km / 1.2 mi
Little White Wedding Chapel - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi
National Atomic Testing Museum - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Desert Research Institute - 2.5 km / 1.5 mi
Arts Factory - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
The Auto Collections - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
High Roller - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
The Linq - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Las Vegas National Golf Club - 2.7 km / 1.7 mi
Clark County Library - 3 km / 1.8 mi
Las Vegas Premium Outlets - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi

The preferred airport for Westgate Las Vegas Resort & Casino is Las Vegas, NV (LAS-McCarran Intl.) - 5.6 km / 3.5 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Las Vegas Hilton is Las Vegas, NV (LAS-McCarran Intl.) - 5.5 km / 3.4 mi.

Room 1
From 2013-03-05 To 2030-12-31
Child policy
Persons under the age of twenty-one (21) are not permitted to stay.They have to stay with another person over the the age of twenty-one (21).

From 2011-04-11 To 2030-12-31
No Name Changes Allowed
Please note that accordingly to the hotel policy, NO name changes are allowed on confirmed bookings, once booked if changes to the names are required then the booking should be cancelled and re-booked.

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

Essential Information:
Mandatory resort fee of approximately 21-25 USD per room per day to be paid directly to the hotel Applicable from 18/Dec/2014 to 31/Mar/2020
Mandatory resort fee of approximately 31-35 USD per room perday to be paid directly to the hotel. Applicable from 11/Apr/2016 to 31/Dec/9999
Please note: An Additional security deposit may be requested upon check in. Please also note there is a resort fee of $33.90 (plus tax) per room per night. Rate is subject to change. The resort fee includes: Fitness center access Internet access Local phone calls Parking **NEW** Courtesy scheduled shuttle bus service to the Las Vegas Strip and Downtown Las Vegas. The schedule will be provided at check in. Max Length-of-Stay is 14 nights. Reservations over 14-nights will not be accepted. Applicable from 01/Jan/0001 to 31/Dec/9999

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.

Room No: 1

Child Policy
Please note that 1 child under 4 years of age may stay free of charge when using existing bedding. The maximum capacity of extra beds/baby cots per room is 1. Extra beds or baby cots are available upon request and needs to be confirmed by the hotel,Pets are strictly not allowed at the property.,Accommodation tax will be charged directly at the property.,The minimum age required to check in is 21 years.,Please note that the reservations with breakfasts made after September 30, 2018 will only include breakfasts for one day, not for the whole stay.

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.
